alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 7:52PM CDT until March 17 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then begin to slowly fall and potentially fall below flood stage Wednesday. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Carthage 17.0 17.8 Sun 6 pm CDT 18.0 17.6 16.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
